channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Shariff Wrapper
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Shariff Wrapper

item.title: CVE-2024-1106|2024-08-01T18:26:30.503Z -- unknown -- shariff%20wrapper
item.description: The Shariff Wrapper WordPress plugin before 4.6.10 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)

item.title: CVE-2024-1106|2024-06-04T18:01:33.183Z -- unknown -- shariff%20wrapper
item.description: The Shariff Wrapper WordPress plugin before 4.6.10 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
